lin: ah|Board 3|md|4S9764HAK62D9C9764,SQT3H74DKQJ5CQT32,SAK8HT853DT87CAK5,SJ52HQJ9DA6432CJ8|an|WillJO|pn|Declarer,West,Dummy,East|sv|n|mb|P|an|Less than 12 points|nt|East has less than 12 points, so passes. |mb|P|an|Less than 12 points|at|You only have 7 points, so you pass. |mb|P|an|Less than 12 points|at|West also passes. |mb|1C|an|3+ Clubs, 12+ points (need 5 Hearts to open 1H)|at|Your partner opens 1C, showing 12+ points and 3+ Clubs.|mb|P|mb|1H|an|4+ Hearts, 6+ points|at|You can no come back into the bidding as a Responder with a 1H bid, showing 6+ points, and 4+ Hearts. |mb|P|mb|2H|an|Heart fit (8+ cards between you)|at|Your partner has four Hearts, so confirms the fit with a 2H bid. |mb|P|mb|P|an|No need to go higher (yet!)|at|There are reasons to go higher, but not this time. |mb|P|pc|DK|nt|They lead the King of Diamonds against your 2H contract. |pc|D7|pc|D2|pc|D9|pc|DQ|at|They try leading another Diamond, |pc|D8|pc|D3|pc|H2|at|but you can trump it. |pc|HA|nt|You shold try to draw some trumps with the Ace, |pc|H4|pc|H3|pc|H9|pc|HK|at|and King, and count them. |pc|H7|pc|H5|pc|HJ|at|There is still one trump against you, and you can't beat it, so leave it alone. |pc|S4|nt|Play some winners in Spades, |pc|S3|pc|SA|pc|S2|pc|SK|pc|S5|pc|S6|pc|ST|pc|S8|at|and play a third round of Spades, |pc|SJ|pc|S7|pc|SQ|at|even though it loses. Your last Spade will be a winner!|pc|C2|pc|CA|pc|C8|pc|C4|pc|DT|pc|DA|pc|H6|pc|D5|pc|S9|pc|C3|pc|C5|pc|HQ|pc|CJ|pc|C6|pc|CT|pc|CK|pc|HT|pc|D4|pc|C7|pc|DJ|pc|H8|pc|D6|pc|C9|pc|CQ|
